name_localized.en: Apartment, 2 Bedrooms, Balcony (check-in location Santa Croce 515)
name_localized.es: Apartment, 2 Bedrooms, Balcony (check-in location Santa Croce 515)

short_description_localized.en: Apartment, 2 Bedrooms, Balcony (check-in location Santa Croce 515)
short_description_localized.es: Apartment, 2 Bedrooms, Balcony (check-in location Santa Croce 515)

description_localized.en:
2 King Beds and 1 Double Sofa Bed
861-sq-foot (80-sq-meter) room, balcony with city views

Club/Executive Level - Separate check-in location
Layout - 2 bedrooms, dining area, and sitting area
Internet - Free WiFi
Entertainment - 40-inch TV
Food & Drink - Kitchenette with refrigerator, stovetop, oven, and microwave
Sleep - Frette Italian linens, a down duvet, and blackout drapes/curtains
Bathroom - 2 bathrooms, bathtub or shower, and rainfall showerhead
Practical - Iron/ironing board; cribs/infant beds available on request
Comfort - Air conditioning and heating
Need to Know - Limited housekeeping
Non-Smoking, renovated in December 2016
